Blix

iPhone UX & UI, Web Design, Branding
Project Overview

Remember & Share your Favorite Places

Blix is an iPhone App to help you keep track of places you've been, places you want to go, and places you want to keep secret.

I worked with the team to rethink and redesign an existing prototype into a more usable and nicer looking iPhone App. Later, I designed a logo, a brochure website, and several prototypes for a future desktop version of the app.

Time for Some Prototypes

Looking to larger screens

While the initial design work for the iPhone app was wrapping up, we started thinking about how Blix might scale up to bigger screens, and I built an html prototype to help visualize this exploration.
